column4: Perfection bonus - completing all tasks perfectly this period (so far)
column5: Unjailed bonus - remain unjailed for the entire period
column6: Jan 6 - Sign within 5 blocks after the v25.3.0 upgrade
column7: Jan 29 - Sign within 5 blocks after the v26.0.0-rc0 upgrade
column9: Provider uptime - must be >0.8 to qualify for this period
